WorkItem.ClosedComment: Eye of the Broodmother now working correctly in most recent Commit
WorkItem.Description: Triggers in module not working correctly due to placement, issue for tracking purposes.
WorkItem.Summary: [RestoSham] Eye of the Broodmother not working as intended

Comments.Message:
Was changeset 42697 supposed to fix this? Looking at the trinkets list after this revision, it looks like trinket special effects aren't being counted at all again. (MP5 + Use:SP trinkets like Energy Siphon are only showing points in Sustained for example.) The proc effects seem to affect the stats in the stats window though. (Broodmother gives 125 SP)

You probably know about this already, but I thought I'd mention it anyway. ^^

Yep, was just about to add it.  The proc now has some value, but it's only correctly being applied to Healing Stream Totem.  It's taking a good bit of work to fix, but is worth it as it should clean up the rest of the calculations a bit more.
Appears to be working 'almost' in 43099.  Until corrected to allow for full stack size, it will only show 100 of the 125 spellpower as actually being used.

Looks like it works mostly correctly now. Thanks for the fix! :)

What needs to be corrected for it to work fully? Anything I can help with?
It's getting the stack-size of the buff to work correctly, is slightly tricky the way I have it set up in RestoSham to put in, but I'm working on it.
